answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
While those are probably the top for management, here are some also-rans:
Dept. of Labor
Dept. of Transportation
Any military branch base command
General Services Administration
Bureau of Reclamation

author: Kevin Carter
text:
What are your thoughts?
I would rank 'em:

Housing and Urban Development
Small Business Administration
Health and Human Services
FEMA
Office of Personnel Management

And probably NASA as very last. Sorry NASA.
title: What federal department best prepares someone for local govt?
